about_the_game:
Can you survive the first 90 days probation to keep your job? Tailored for those who've ever dreamt of pranking their Manager, or anyone looking to escape into a game that mirrors the chaos of office life humor. Inspired by daydreams of pranks and ways to get through the day.

Choose Your Path:

  • Work Hard or Slack Off: Will you be the epitome of productivity, or the office's secret slacker? The choice affects not just your standing but your sanity.

  • Dynamic Schedule Management: Balance your work and leisure time. Overwork for more cash? Maybe. Slack off for a prank? Why not?

Gameplay Highlights:

  • Office Lifestyle With A Twist: Engage in funny pranks, each decision affecting your performance score and future unlocks.

  • Explore Downtown: When the office day ends, the city is yours. Explore, socialize, or just relax, impacting how you face the next workday.

  • Customization Options: Use varies options to customize your hair,accessories, color options and more!

Reasons To Play:

  • Relatable Satire: Find humor in the absurdity of office life, where the mundane becomes fun.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Juggling life stats like hunger, sleep, and other needs to survive. Find places to hide when your slacking off or work through the tedious tasks at hand.

  • Community Engagement: Share tips, laughs, and maybe even your survival strategies with others navigating the same corporate jungle.
